name: Buraco
summary:
Copag, the largest deck maker in Brazil, in partnership with MegaJogos, a reference in Online Card Games, brings you the multiplayer and singleplayer games.

Also known as Canastra or Biriba, the Buraco Aberto variation is one of the most popular card games in Brazil. You can play alone against the computer or with your friends online.

name: Buzz Lightyear of Star Command
summary: Buzz Lightyear of Star Command is a Windows PC game created by Traveller's Tales with Disney Interactive and PIXAR in 2000. The game consists of multiple planets, each with a villain on it. In each level, the players race the villain to their getaway destination. Then, they engage in a one-on-one battle with the villain, which usually requires destroying an energy shield surrounding the villain.

name: Bullet Candy
summary: Bullet Candy is a fast paced, action packed arena shooter. There are a variety of combo systems and many secret techniques that you can employ to get the best score and weapon upgrades possible. Viewed from a top-down perspective, Bullet Candy allows for a true 360¬∞ shoot-em-up experience. With all of your enemies in view at all times it's easy to see and, more importantly, shoot them into tiny little pieces.

name: Bunny Factory
summary: Help bunny to set up factory production by restoring all control blocks. Solve 3D puzzles alone or with friends.

name: Bunny Rampage: History of Revenge
summary:
Embark on a captivating adventure with Max, a plush rabbit brought to life!

Unfold the secrets hidden within captivating portals, venturing from the bustling streets of New York City to the enigmatic depths of an alien bunker. Face hordes of enemies in exhilarating battles, unravel mind-bending puzzles, and navigate challenging platforming sections.

name: Burger Station
summary: As the world is seen through a hungry lens, so does it's next victim see what they desire in their very own childish eyes. Burger Station is a tiny, spooky yet cute game about trying to get a single piece of candy.

name: Butter Side Down
summary: Butter Side Down is a bizarro choose-your-own-choice game. Starring Basil Bonser, Adam Spargo, Grey Michael, Beatrice, Jeep Johnson, and Rotten Ruggerio. Answer questions, take calls, play card games, and solve one hell of a mystery.

name: BuildMoreCubes
summary: It is an army vs army game.You need to constantly rebuild and grow your army in order to survive or win the battle.

name: Bug Dates
summary:
Just like bugs, this game is cute, creepy, and a little bit eerie.

Lonely? Don't worry! Your best friend signs you up for a dating show without your permission. The fun part you're gonna date some bugs! Have fun!

name: Bulletheart
summary: Learn the layouts, master the mechanics, and optimize your bullet usage to achieve victory in Bulletheart. Augment yourself with powerful upgrades and eliminate enemies with style.

name: Burger Truck Trump
summary: Love him or hate him, Donald Trump has been given the boot, but his mission is to return to the white house... by selling burgers! Can you help him restore him to power and get him back behind is beloved Resolute Desk?

name: Buddies in a Ball
summary: Trapped inside of a giant rolling ball, you and your friends must roll, bounce, and scream your way through diverse levels. Solo or co-op, try to beat every level in the fastest time.

name: Bubble Bobble Micro Player
summary: Popping onto the scene in 1986, this is the epic adventure of brothers Bob and Bub, who have been transformed into dragons, and must battle through 100 levels to save their girlfriends. Featuring simple yet strategic gameplay, Bubble Bobble continues to be a fan favorite and is consistently ranked among the best games of all time.

name: BulletVille
summary: BulletVille is a free-to-play, multiplayer, third-person parkour hero shooter & platformer featuring a grapple hook, high-mobility and wacky characters.

name: Builders of China
summary:
Builders of China allows you to manage the economy of various Chinese settlements, from the flooded banks of the Yellow River and the unpredictable North China Plain to the rugged western mountain ranges. 
 Create extensive irrigation systems to tame the hostile land, establish harbors and trading outposts, grow your population, research new technologies and spread your culture and knowledge. Secure the Mandate of Heaven through competent and benevolent rule, or face being overthrown by your subjects.

name: Bust A Groove 2
summary: Bust a Groove 2 is a hybrid music/fighting game released in 2000 for the Sony PlayStation and is the sequel to Bust a Groove. The game was originally released in Japan as Bust a Move 2: Dance Tengoku Mix, and was never released in Europe.

name: Bulletstorm: Full Clip Edition
summary:
"Battle your way through throngs of Stygia‚Äôs mutated inhabitants, performing masterful kills throughout the single-player campaign‚Äîor one of 30 competitive score-challenge or 12 co-operative multiplayer maps‚Äîusing Bulletstorm: Full Clip Edition‚Äôs unique ‚ÄúSkillshot‚Äù system that rewards you for executing the most creative and deadly kills imaginable.

Bulletstorm: Full Clip edition is the definitive Bulletstorm experience that includes all existing Bulletstorm add-ons, plus brand-new content exclusive to Full Clip!"

name: BurnerSphere
summary: BurnerSphere is an immersive social VR experience where players explore VR documentary content filmed at Burning Man. Navigate iconic art installations, engage with interactive workshops, and connect with friends or meet new ones to go on adventures. Experience Burner Culture like never before!

name: Buddy Collection If: Red Thread of Fate
summary: The first episode with some extras. Hayato's route can be selected.

name: Burokku Girls
summary:
A blocky world filled with girls...

Caught inside malfunctioning Virtual Reality equipment, Takeshi finds himself surrounded by a world of blocks... and beautiful girls!

But a creeping menace lurks in the darkness...

With no apparent way to escape the mysterious virtual land, Takeshi joins forces with...

name: Burn Zombie Burn!
summary:
Welcome to the char-grilled world of Burn Zombie Burn, where the best type of undead is barbequed undead.

The goals are simple: keep Bruce alive, as he tries to keep Daisy alive, and get the highest score possible. Standing (well, ambling) in your way is a never ending horde of the rotting, stinking and stupid undead. Fortunately our mild-mannered hero Bruce can get hold of some tasty weaponry. Burn, batter, shoot, maim, blow up, mince, and obliterate as many zombies as possible before they make Bruce their dinner‚Ä¶

Flaming zombies are faster and more dangerous than regular uncooked zombies. But burning zombies drop better pickups and act as a score multiplier ‚Äì light ‚Äòem up, score big, and have fun.

name: Bunny Hop Hare Trigger
summary: Hone your movement skills and strive for the fastest times in this speedrunning/parkour platformer!

name: Bugscraper
summary: Rise to the top of a bug-infested tower by fighting on an elevator. On each floor, waves of enemies will come for your skin (or rather, exoskeleton). With your trusty pea gun, eliminate them and prepare for the next floor!

name: Bullet Butlers: Juudan no Kanata
summary: A PSP version Bullet Butlers.

name: Burger Shop 2 Deluxe
summary:
In Burger Shop, you successfully created a universal chain of restaurants and found fame and fortune... Until one day, you found yourself in a dumpster with a bump on your head, your restaurants boarded up, and no memory of how any of it happened. 

Now in Burger Shop 2 you must rebuild your restaurant empire, adding new twists to your menu to entice new customers while uncovering the truth about what happened to your original restaurant chain. 

Grab ingredients from the BurgerTron 2000 to create tasty food items to serve hungry customers in this fast-paced food making game!

GAME FEATURES:
‚Ä¢ 120 Story Levels and 120 Expert Levels!
‚Ä¢ Challenge Modes and Relax Modes!
‚Ä¢ Server breakfast, lunch, and dinner!
‚Ä¢ Over 100 different food items! 
‚Ä¢ Over 100 trophies to collect! 
‚Ä¢ Unlimited play!
‚Ä¢ No ads!

Burger Shop 2 offers endless play with four different play modes!

GAME MODES:

‚Ä¢ Story Mode - Rebuild your restaurant empire, and solve the mystery of who or what destroyed your original burger chain.

‚Ä¢ Challenge Mode - Play lightning fast one-minute rounds - but don't lose a customer or it's all over!

‚Ä¢ Relax Mode - Serve food without any pressure or stress.  Customers are infinitely patient.

‚Ä¢ Expert Mode - So, you think you are the Burger Master? Put your food-making skills to the test!


Available in 11 languages: English, German, Spanish, French, Italian, Dutch, Portuguese, Swedish, Indonesian, Russian, and Japanese.

name: Bullet Witch
summary:
Bullet Witch is a shooter video game for the Xbox 360 developed by Cavia. It was released in Japan on July 27, 2006 by AQ Interactive, followed by a release in North America on February 27, 2007. Atari Europe handled translations and other localization efforts. The game was not released with a multiplayer component, although players could participate in a score ranking competition via Xbox Live. Downloadable content includes new costumes and new missions. A later Japanese re-release under the "Xbox 360 Platinum Collection" label included all of the downloadable content on the game disc.

The player takes control of a witch named Alicia Claus in the near future of 2013. Mankind is on the brink of destruction, having suffered major natural disasters and an invasion of demons. The protagonist Alicia utilizes a gun rod that has transformations such as shotgun, machine gun, and Gatling gun. This weapon can also be used to cast spells.

name: Bugs Bunny in Double Trouble GG2SMS
Buddy City Inc.
summary: Raise a Buddy for a strange and mysterious company. Rise through the ranks as you learn and grow with your Buddy!

name: Bullfist
summary:
BIGJam 6 of 8! This game was originally for a 3 hour contest with the themes ‚ÄúCommunist Bull Rage‚Äù and ‚ÄúRandom‚Äù, though we didn‚Äôt finish in time. I finished it up after the event.

This game is a collab with Hayden Scott-Baron, Alex May and Battlerager.

name: Bunny Beats
summary: Bunny Beats is a fast-paced rhythm learning game with procedurally generated rhythms. Each bunny swings its mochi hammer with a distinct rhythm; master the rhythms on the fly to make the best mochi for the moon goddess!

name: Bunny Dusty
summary: The Childe awakens to the sound of drums. "Oh, I sure hope that's not fee-fi-fo-fum!" This 2D Action-Adventure Platformer packs lots of fun. Figuring out who you really are has only just begun!

name: Bubba Yuga
summary: Bubba Yuga is a 2-player couch co-op puzzle game based on the Slavic folktales of the Baba Yaga. Playing as a pair of tied together witches, you and a friend must work together with your walking house to capture all the woodland children and break the curse that's been placed upon your family.

name: Buzz! Junior Ace Racers
summary: Buzz! Junior: Ace Racers is the fifth and latest game in the Buzz! Junior series of party games. It was developed by Cohort Studios and released in 2008 for the PlayStation 2.[1]

name: Bunny Hill Horror
summary:
You have a problem: you're out of work, and the government is threatening to cut off your benefits. Don't worry- Oswald Mandias will help you. He'll help everybody. Once his dreams of resurrecting an ancient kingdom are realised, nobody will be spared his benevolence.

In this visual novel adventure, you must outwit zombies, genetically modified monstrosities, seductive sisters and one very sadistic secretary, in order to prevent a dark and terrifying future for mankind. Oh, and get to the pub quiz in time because your mate Dave won't stop nagging you about it.

Assorted Facts:
Bunny Hill is a real place in Staffordshire, England and the outside backgrounds were photographed there.
The interior background and castle shots were taken on a day trip to Tamworth Castle.
Bunny Hill Castle was one of Stoke-on-Trent's leading attractions on Google Maps for several months until someone spoilt the fun and told them that it doesn't really exist.
The characters are all Deviant Art stock models with the exception of Dave who is played by the game's writer Dominic O'Reilly
Several of the items are real-life props, including the Father Ted referencing "Dreamy Sleepy Nightie Snoozy Snooze"
Although the itch.io version is 13+, an uncut 18+ version of this game exists on Gamejolt and Newgrounds.
Bunny Hill Horror appeared in the itch.io Black Lives Matter bundle (2020) which raised over $8,000,000.

name: Burnout Legends
summary: Burnout: Legends takes the most explosive moments of the popular Burnout series of racing games, mashes them together and adds some new surprises -- giving you the best racing experience to come out for the DS. Use your car as a weapon and battle your way to the front of the pack - by taking out rivals and instigating spectacular crashes. Speed, depth and destruction are waiting for you, in the game of on-the-go automotive anarchy.

name: Bubble Cloud: Spinning Bubbles
summary:
Shoot bubbles and climb your way up from the ground to the outer space in this fun twist of a ‚Äúmatch three‚Äù bubble shooter game, inspired by such classics as Bubble Shooter and Bubble Spinner.

Highlights:

- Shoot bubbles and blast your way up through the clouds!
- Bubbles are spinning: Precise aiming and bouncing off the walls are a must!
- Explore 150+ challenging levels
- Powerful boosters like the laser weapon and super spin
- Full HD graphics optimized for Retina display
- Free download and free level updates

Your goal in each level is to clear the bubbles and break the glass in the middle to collect the stars. The more bubbles you clear, the more stars you get. Stars are needed to unlock new worlds and special boosters. Can you collect all 99 stars to unlock the special infinity level?

Shooting bubbles has never been this fun. State of the art gameplay together with full HD graphics, unparalleled controls and a game experience optimized for iPad guarantees an experience unmatched in the bubble shooting industry.

---

Please note: Bubble Cloud is free to play and download but some optional in-game items will require payment. You can turn off the payment feature by disabling in-app purchases in your device‚Äôs settings. Also, under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 13 years of age to play or download Bubble Cloud.

Support FAQ: If you have any questions, please see the Frequently Asked Questions at http://valasmedia.com/BubbleCloudFAQ.

Support Email: If your question is not answered in the FAQ, please contact our support at support@valasmedia.com.

Terms of Service: http://valasmedia.com/terms-of-service/

Privacy Policy: http://valasmedia.com/privacy-policy/

name: Built by Force
summary: Merge Titanfall-style gunplay with Satisfactory base-building and Minecraft exploration in a living, randomized world. Transform at will, master a single-resource economy, and join with up to 11 friends to face adaptive AI enemies.

name: Bullet Yeeters
summary: Bullet Yeeters is a third-person shooter where miniature agents navigate oversized household environments using jetpacks. Players engage in combat across domestic settings like kitchens and living rooms, face boss encounters, and can modify their characters' appearances and loadouts. The game emphasizes aerial mobility and firefights within familiar spaces transformed into battlegrounds.

name: Burial
summary: A videographer receives the task of filming a wake in an old Soviet apartment. But he soon realizes that something terrible is lurking within these walls. And in the middle of the room there is a closed coffin...

name: Bussy Master: Halloween Advent 2024
summary: Surrender to the allure of Bussy Master: Halloween 2024! Encounter seductive zombies, irresistible demons, sultry vampires, haunting werewolves, sinister evil clowns, mysterious masked killers and lots more! Let your deepest fantasies awaken in this thrilling puzzle adventure. üß©

name: Build-A-Bear Workshop: Bear Valley
summary: Welcome to Build-A-Bear Workshop Bear Valley, the valley where your furry friends magically come to life.

name: Bunny Must Die! Chelsea and the 7 Devils
summary: From the creator of the Gundemonium Collection comes a thrilling new 2D action-platformer! Help Bunny escape the Devils‚Äô Labyrinth and defeat the 7 Devils in this hilariously over-the-top action-platformer game. Battle through a large, connected map filled with unique enemies, traps, and puzzles. Use magical items like the Sylph Shooter and the Hyper Heels to power up and defeat the 7 Devils. Manipulate the fabric of time to solve puzzles and survive. Will Bunny be rid of those new ears she so despises? Only with your assistance can she brave this dangerous maze...

name: Bush Hockey League
summary: Aggressive hockey is back! Experience hockey the way it was meant to be played in this old school arcade style hockey game where blood on the ice is just another day at the rink. Big moustaches, no helmets, dirty hits, bench-clearing brawls, goalie fights, and stick fights ‚Äì that‚Äôs Old Time Hockey.

name: Bus Driver: Pocket Edition
summary: Take the wheel of 12 different buses all modeled from real-world vehicles such as the American school bus or London's double-decker buses for a realistic driving experience. An optimized interface and controls include all-new tilt steering and trackpad steering for easier handling and more intuitive play.

name: Buhei
summary: Dive into an action-packed Twin Stick Party Shooter! Grab your friends and engage in explosive multiplayer battles, whether you're playing right next to them on the couch or from a distance.

name: Burst
summary:
Challenge your music! Destroy enemies. Avoid obstacles. Run for your life...and points. Go for a high score and always fight to the beat!
Only .ogg files are supported.

name: Burai Fighter
summary: In a remote corner of the galaxy, there lives a race of super-brains known as the Burai. For thousands of years, their vast mental capabilities have been focused upon one goal: the conquest of the universe! To accomplish this, they are creating huge armies of robo-mutants - bizarre creatures, half robot and half living flesh. With their seven manufacturing bases producing thousands of robo-mutants each day, the Burai armies will soon overrun the galaxy - unless you can stop them! Strap on your proton pack, charge up your laser cannon, and prepare to do battle with the deadliest army of mutant rogues in the universe. You must somehow penetrate the seven bases of the Burai, where you will confront a super-mutant guarding each base - monstrous creatures like the Giganticrab, Jawsipede, and Fangskull - until finally, you face the terrifying Slimedragon! But with the awesome arsenal of weapons at your command, victory may still be within your reach. It's up to you to rid the universe of the evil Burai once and for all!

name: Bulletline
summary: Welcome to a world where ninjas, spec-ops agents, chefs, cowboys, princesses, and the wretched hag do battle with automatic assault weapons and high-powered rifles - Bulletline is the ultimate combat-focused, team-based, local-multiplayer game-mode-royale.

name: Burger Shop 2
summary:
In Burger Shop, you receive some strange blueprints in the mail and build an extraordinary food-making contraption. Can you build your restaurant into a successful food empire?

In Burger Shop 2 you awake in a dumpster, with a bump on your head and no recollection of how you got there. Now, you must rebuild your restaurant empire, adding new twists to your menu to entice new customers while uncovering the truth about what happened to your original restaurant chain. Grab ingredients from the BurgerTron2000 to create tasty food items to serve hungry customers in this fast-paced food making game! Start your food making adventure today!

name: Bubble Wizard III Saga
summary: Match, shoot, and blast through magical levels!

name: Bunny Space Odyssey: FlopHop
summary: Embark on a pixel adventure with Ponchee the bunny in "Bunny Space Odyssey: FlopHop". Solve puzzles, protect plants, and uncover deep mysteries with Usagi-01 on an uninhabited planet.

name: Bust-A-Move Universe
summary: Bust-A-Move (also known as Puzzle Bobble) is a real-time puzzle game in which the player controls a device called "pointer" at the bottom of the screen, aiming and releasing randomly colored bubbles upwards. Depending on the aiming, the bubbles may float up directly or bounce off the walls, changing their trajectory. The goal is to aim the bubbles in such a way that they will touch identically colored ones. When such bubbles form a group of three or more, they pop and disappear from the screen.

name: Burglin' Gnomes
summary: An online Co-op game about breaking into houses and causing havoc as a tiny gnome. Avoid danger, repurpose stolen household items, and complete tasks to meet the High-Gnome‚Äôs demands. Craft equipment and upgrade your home to make your missions easier and more successful.

name: Bunker: The Underground Game
summary: This is Bunker: The Underground Game. You probably never heard of it but since you now have, you are one of the cool kids. Game takes place deep down in a forgotten Soviet bunker. You spend rest of your absurd adventure puzzling, mini gaming, pointing, clicking, hipstering, err humor-ing oh and escaping what is no doubt the weirdest bunker you have ever been unwillingly dragged to.

name: Bus Driver Simulator
summary: All aboard, please, the ride's starting. Punctually like clockwork you start your working day as a bus driver and transport your passengers safely to their destination. In the hustle and bustle of city life, it is not always easy to keep to schedules, follow traffic rules, and turn your blinkers at the right intersection. Timetables through big cities as well as numerous trips in suburbs provide variety and long-term driving pleasure! Buses from various eras and countries will accompany you on your journeys. Buy new buses with your hard-earned money or design your already available vehicles according to your taste! Play in free mode or fulfill different scenarios while you live your dream job and take over an important role in public life!

name: Bubble Bobble The Revival
summary: Bubble Bobble - Revival - A classic of the 80s is back to stay! Catch your enemies in bubbles and eat al the fruits to progress to the final level.

name: Bug Riders: The Race of Kings
summary: The King of Entymion, Leptus, is about to die. Rather than hold elections or keep the tradition of primogeniture, the next king will be chosen with a race. Not just any race, but a race in which the participants ride on giant bugs. Choose from 22 different contestants, each with unique racing styles and weapon, and try to be the first to the finish line on six tracks. If finishing first is a little too tough, make your bug go faster by using your riding crop. But be careful, or your bug will quit running for you. For those looking for a less-than-honest way to win, collect power-ups and weapons scattered throughout the track to blow past your opponents or blast them out of the sky. And don't forget to keep your eyes open for the shortcuts in each track. Do you have the nerve and the skill to win the Great Race? Play BUG RIDERS: The Race of Kings and find out.

name: Burger Joint
summary: Welcome to Burger Joint, a strategy game where you both design a restaurant and grow a criminal enterprise. With these two sides of your operation working side by side, you can build your own thriving business. Be wary however, the police, FDA, and a rival cartel are just around the corner.

name: Bully Online
summary: BULLY SCHOLARSHIP EDITION ONLINE IS FINALLY HERE!! 60+ minigames, roleplay, freeroam, custom vehicles, restored beta content, map improvements, and easter eggs have been added!

name: Bunny Battle Nemesis
summary: Sci-fi, bloodthirsty bunnies, and the powers of a goddess at your disposal! This is Bunny Battle Nemesis. Experience intense action, explosions, and chaos as you defend the Bunny Kingdom from certain doom at the hands of a vengeful demigod and her army of mercenaries.

name: Burst Into
summary: Burst Into is an indie game that will give you a break with your friends on the chosen map.

name: Bubble Wizard IV Saga
summary: The magic returns in Bubble Wizard IV Saga!

name: Buried Alive: Breathless Rescue & Whittingham Asylum: The Investigation
Bungo Bash
summary: A platform fighter that is fully 3D! Use your powerful abilities to knock other players out of the stage. The more attacks you land the farther they go!! PVP battles across vibrant stages in the world of Bungalow.

name: Bubble Bobble
summary: An unofficial port of Taito's Bubble Bobble, released exclusively in Korea for MSX computers.

name: Bunny Bond
summary: Bunny Bond is a steamy visual novel where you can chat, flirt, and fall in love with 6 handsome guys! Enjoy fun interactions with the group, send DMs to whoever catches your eye, and collect all of the sexy pictures they send to you!

name: Burning Skies Arcade: Supporter Pack
summary: Have access to multiple of exclusive version and prototypes of Burning Skies in multiple development stages, this optional package for players who likes and want to support my work.

name: Bumper Brawlers
summary: A fun, fast-paced, cartoon styled vehicle brawler.

name: Buddy Collection Extra: Kochousou no Kimyou na Go-nin
summary: Buddy Collection Extra: Kochousou no Kimyou-na Gonin includes a new scenario titled ‚ÄúThe Peculiar Five of Butterfly Manor‚Äù that expands upon the main game's story and characters. Along with that, there's now more voiced character dialogue.

name: Bushido Blade
summary: "Bushido" is the soul of Japan - an ancient honor code deeply followed by samurai warriors for centuries. Plunge into real world battles across vast 3D environments that you can run, slice and tear through. Sword matches become unbelievably real where one critical blow is the mean difference between death and victory.

name: Buzz Aldrin's Space Program Manager
summary:
Buzz Aldrin's Space Program Manager (SPM) Road to the Moon is the ultimate game of space exploration. It is the mid 1950s and the race for dominance between the US and the Soviet Union is about to move into a new dimension: space. Take charge of the US or Soviet space agencies - your duty is be the first to the moon. Carefully manage your budget by opening programs, spending R&D funds on improving the hardware, recruiting personnel and launching space missions in this realistic turn based strategy game.

Road to the Moon features the race to the Moon, the historical event that started in the early 1960s and that ended in July 1969, after the successful completion of the Apollo 11 mission.

The game features both a campaign and a sandbox mode. In campaign mode, you will be able to play as the Director of either NASA or the Soviet Space Agency in order to beat the other side to be the first on the Moon. You can also lead the Global Space Agency (GSA), an fictional space agency that combines programs from all the major space agencies in the world . In the GSA campaign, you will need to address the requests and short-term goals issued by government, and is geared towards those players who prefer a game experience focused on exploration instead of competition. Alternatively, all three space agencies feature a Sandbox mode, which provides a more open-ended experience and allows you to try out different approaches without any political pressure.

You will be able to develop dozens of programs. Some examples include the X-15 and the PKA space planes, the Sputnik satellite, the Mercury, Voskhod, Apollo and Soyuz manned spacecraft and the Mars Viking probe. You are not limited to missions that did launch, as as the game also allows you to try out many concepts that were planned but that never left the drawing board. For example, instead of sending men to the Moon using the Lunar Orbit Rendezvous (LOR) approach used by Project Apollo in the late 1960s and early 1970s, you will be able to rewrite history and use either the alternative Gemini Earth Orbit Rendezvous (EOR) or Gemini Direct Ascent (DA) schemes. The number of options available ensure every game will be different and there is huge replay value.

To verify its accuracy and authenticity, the game, is being developed in consultation with Dr. Buzz Aldrin, former U.S. Air Force combat pilot (66 missions in Korea) and NASA astronaut, who took part in the first Moon landing mission and became the second human being to walk on the Moon.

If you have any interest in space exploration and the events that transpired during the 'Race to the Moon', this is a game you just do not want to miss.

name: Bug
summary: Bug is an action clicker game where you just smash pesky bugs and DO YOUR PART! Have you been taken out of action or not allowed to protect SuperDuperEarth? Welcome to the planet Drake, where you can destroy bugs from a remote drone turret FOR FREEdom!

name: Bubble Aim
summary: Bubble Aim is an exciting game where bubbles of various colors and sizes descend from the sky. The player must shoot these bubbles, causing them to either burst or split into smaller bubbles. Each successful shot earns the player points. The objective is to shoot as many bubbles as possible without letting them fall to the ground. The game is endless, challenging players to achieve the highest score possible by continuously popping bubbles. How many bubbles can you shoot?

name: Buried in Ice
summary: Buried in Ice is a first-person horror game with survival and shooter elements. As a Secret Service Agent, you have been assigned to guard and ensure the correct functioning of an Antarctic research base. Can you survive and solve one of the most concealed mysteries of the U.S. Government?

name: Burdock 2
summary: Burdock 2 is a single-player action-horror game. Explore a lost place in a post-apocalyptic future, and help the main character's friends, or leave everyone behind and embark on the path of darkness. Find all the clues and open the way to the passage. Solve puzzles and do not lose your composure.

name: Buzz!: Master Quiz
summary:
Packing over 5,000 questions on topics including music, celebrities, TV, sport, science, nature, movies and more, Buzz! PSP puts gamer‚Äôs knowledge to the test at home or on the move. With six new round types specifically designed for PSP including the speed-is-of-the-essence 'Quickfire Challenge', the picture-puzzler 'Picture This' and the mind-boggling 'Virus Challenge', each round also comes complete with pictures and videos .

The focus of Buzz! has always been on social gaming and the PSP version is no different, with three exciting multiplayer modes ideal to play with friends and family. The game features three multiplayer modes that require either one PSP (to pass around) or one copy of the game (thanks to Game Share, users can pass their friends a temporary copy of the game to play to play with up to four players.) Additionally, Quiz Host mode enables up to six players to play against each other, with one taking control of the game to select and ask the questions. The Quiz Host runs the whole game, with the power to award (or even deduct) points however they see fit. Not only does Buzz! PSP offer innovative multiplayer handheld quiz action; it also has more robust single player mode than previous Buzz! games.

name: Bubsy: The Woolies Strike Back
summary:
"Bubsy the Woolies Strike Back! is an all new Bubsy adventure featuring Bubsy in a bevy of exotic locations as he travels the planet looking for the beloved Golden Fleece.

Bubsy must use all of his classic moves and a few new ones to dodge and out bobcat a battalion of Woolies, not mention the gnarliest UFO bosses to ever grace a Bubsy adventure.

The wisecracking lynx also adds over a 100 new one liners to his lexicon to keep fans guessing what he‚Äôll say next."

name: Buckler 2
summary: Buckler 2 is a retro-styled roguelite platformer that tells a story about love, hate, and everything in between. Join Venice and his friends as they embark on an epic adventure across Sector Omega, an unfamiliar world filled with enemies, allies, hazards, and more!

name: Buzz!: Quiz World
summary:
Buzz!: Quizz World is the ninth game in the Buzz! series of quiz games.
It allows users to use question packs purchased for previous Buzz! games as well as supporting user created content and online play. Unlike the previous PSP Buzz!, Buzz: Quiz World (PSP) supports DLC. As with all previous Buzz games the game is available in a game only (Solus) version or in a bundle which includes 4 wireless Buzz! Buzzers and a USB dongle for wireless connectivity (each dongle can connect 4 buzzers to the PlayStation 3).

Quiz World features a mix of old and new round types. For example, one new round hides the answers and then slowly reveals them.
A new feature in Quiz World is player profiling and the host Buzz addressing the player by name, informing them of their abilities and record as a player.

Buzz!: Quiz World also supported PlayStation Home rewards that are rewarded by winning the prize after a round of Buzz!: Quiz World. It supports full game launching for PlayStation Home as well.

In late-March 2010, Sony and Relentless released a patch for Buzz!: Quiz World that added a feature to allow players to post to Facebook from within the game. According to the companies involved, this made the game the first in the world to offer such functionality. The patched Facebook features allow players to post details of the game session just played, including the in-game names of those who took part, and who won.

name: Build-a-lot: On Vacation
summary: Vacation towns are looking to upgrade their local attractions and your skills are needed! Can you get the gondola working at the ski resort? Will the fairgrounds get constructed in time for the festival? Find out in Build-a-lot: On Vacation!

name: Burger Bots Inc.
summary: An online co-op burger flipping game with scary and strange customers that you shouldn't anger. Play either solo or up to group of 8!

name: Bubble Bobble 4 Friends
summary:
After more than 10 years, Nintendo Switch players can look forward to a sequel of the cult 80's game series Bubble Bobble by TAITO. The new Bubble Bobble 4 Friends was developed by the original studio TAITO Corporation and will include a brand new local 4-player mode.

As in the previous highly popular series, the thrilling and epic bubble fight starts again!

name: Bubblefish Bob
summary: You're Bob, and you must save your fishy friends by matching three same-colored bubbles before the fish inside reach their awful fate. Beware of giant piranha-like guppies waiting to gobble up your friends unless you can free them in time by breaking and matching the bubbles. Collect falling treasures to bolster your score and gain lives to free more fish.

name: Button Lock
summary: Navigate through a series of intricate‚Äîor possibly incredibly simple‚Äîmazes. But beware, as you are only given a certain number of moves to work with. You must make the most of your surroundings and discover unconventional pathways in order to proceed in this head-scratching puzzle game.

name: Bullet Inferno
summary: A Bullet Hell style game based on Dante's Inferno. Dodge your way through all 9 circles of the Inferno to hopefully find the lord and pray for his forgiveness!

name: Buckshot Roulette
summary:
Buckshot Roulette is a tabletop horror game that attempts to re-design the infamous game of Russian Roulette, replacing the traditional revolver with a proper 12-gauge pump-action shotgun. This extra firepower, and more importantly the different mechanics in handling a shotgun compared to a revolver, offers a fresh take on the classic and deadly game of chance.

The game takes place at the top of an underground nightclub, where the metal railings tremble to the pulse of long lost drum machines. A crooked AI dealer is waiting for you. Will you meet them?

name: Burnin' Rubber
summary: Amstrad GX4000 port of Burnin' Rubber.

name: Bulwark Evolution: Falconeer Chronicles - Mad Lector Bundle
summary:
Bulwark is about designing your fortress and expanding it into an empire.

I hope you enjoy my attempts to experiment and evolve this game into something enjoyable and fresh.
Bulwark also continues to evolve with each passing update, based on your feedback.

name: Bunch of Games
summary: BUNCH OF GAMES is what name says it is - It's a Bunch of Games.There are more than a dozen games to choose from, Racing, Shooter, Strategy, Casual and many more! Take part in action packed vehicle deathmatches or fly to the sunset, manage your farm or play a tavern game.

name: Burning Fight
summary: Duke and Billy, two popular and renowned New York City Police detectives, are hot on the trail of a dangerous Japanese crime syndicate. Their investigation has led them to the mean streets of Japan where they meet a police officer and martial arts expert named Ryu. Ryu agrees to join the NYPD detectives as they track down the crime syndicate bosses and end their reign of terror once and for all.

name: Bulletrooms
summary: It's still the same yellow rooms, but now you're the hunter here instead of the victim.

name: Bubonic: OutBreak
summary: You are in debt, your wife and kids have left and you have nothing left to lose, but how far will this take you? It is just another regular day at the office as a private detective and you find on your desk a letter from a friend tipping you off to something good. What will you find? Only time will tell...

name: Bus Simulator 21: MAN Bus Pack
summary:
Attention all Angel Shores and Seaside Valley bus drivers!

You want to upgrade your fleet with the content of the "Bus Simulator 21 ‚Äì Extended Edition", including the fresh design of the new MAN Lion's City 12 city bus with three fancy interior sets? Then this is the perfect expansion pack for you!

name: Bunnyrama
summary: Bunnyrama is a puzzle adventure game where your goal is to lead the old man through the magical forest full of huge bunnies.

name: Bullet Roulette VR
summary: Four suspisios persons with mysterious past are sitting around the table in the gloomy dark bar playing Russian Roulette. Beware of other players, because they don't look like someone who plan to play fair. Be tricky and become the last survivor!

name: Bubble Fighter
summary: Crazy Shooting Bubble Fighter(aka. ÌÅ¨Î†àÏù¥ÏßÄÏäàÌåÖ Î≤ÑÎ∏îÌååÏù¥ÌÑ∞) is a casual TPS game by Nexon.

name: Burning Questions
summary: Save the burning evidence.

name: Bumptz Science Carnival
summary: An educational science game from Theatrix

name: Bullship!
summary: Bullship is a multiplayer social deduction game inspired by classic Battleship. Find and sink your enemy‚Äôs ships using deduction over luck. The seas are shrouded in a fog of deception, which pirate crew will make it to the clear?

name: Bubble Trouble 3
summary: Burst Bubbles, Share the Fun!

name: Bunnies & Ballgames!
summary: Bunnies and squirrels play soccer! Navigate environmental hazards! Explore the critters' home to find powerups!

name: Buccaneers!
summary: Buccaneers! is a first-person pirate game for PC, Xbox One and VR devices. The game is set in the Caribbean sea after the end of the Golden Age of Piracy, and explores a fictional timeline in which piracy recovers and becomes a major threat to the balance of power in the region. The player joins one of four factions and helps them to fight for dominance on land and at sea.

name: Bulwark Evolution: Falconeer Chronicles - Mongres Trader Bundle
summary:
Bulwark is about designing your fortress and expanding it into an empire.

I hope you enjoy my attempts to experiment and evolve this game into something enjoyable and fresh.

name: Bush Dog
summary: Fight the timer to herd the sheep on unique maps with each round adding more sheep.

name: Bullet Age
summary:
Slash and blast your way through a fantasy wasteland 
 
The world of New Haven is a wasteland. The ARC empire destroyed it with a single Mutagen Bomb that transformed its creatures to mutated monsters. 
 
Join the Gunsword heroes in this classic co-op 2D action-platformer as they become the last hope for the United Resistance. 
 
Gain powerful abilities to dash, spin, and blast through creepy creatures, mutated soldiers and huge bosses. It‚Äôs up to you to stop the ARC from achieving world domination. 
 
Key Features: 
 
Play through dozens of meticulously designed levels chock-full of secrets, challenging platforming and over the top bosses that spans over 3 continents. 
 
Intuitive combat system that mixes hack and slash action and run and gun gameplay. 
Purchase and upgrade weapons with unique parts that will give bullets devastating abilities. 
 
Full co-op adventure with single Joy-con support and HD rumble to feel each action and help you locate hidden secrets. 
Beautiful hand-drawn cartoon graphics and fluid animation bring the world of Bullet Age to life.

name: Burger Bois
summary: A food truck simulator about flavor, not labor. As chief burger designer, craft perfect sandwiches and turn your customers‚Äô most vague requests into culinary masterpieces - or disasterpieces! No recipe, no 'one-right-answer': just let your tastebuds take you to the top.

name: Burning Ball
summary: A classic arkanoid game now with 3D graphics and vivid effects! Hit the ball with the platform and try to destroy all the objects on the screen!

name: Bubble Breeze Pop
summary: Help the brave and clever sky-cat Sunny in her quest to save her colibri friends from the clutches of the evil magpie... Aim, shoot, and blast your way to victory as you clear new levels with bubble-blasting chain reactions!

name: Building the Great Wall of China 2
summary: Embark on an epic quest to build the greatest structure in the history of mankind ‚Äì The Great Wall of China ‚Äì in this addictive and fast paced time-management game.

name: Burden of Choice
summary: Burden of Choice is a psychological horror game where fear changes with your answers. Trapped inside a decaying asylum, you are guided by a sinister voice that constantly questions your morality. Every room presents disturbing choices, every answer reshapes the horror.

name: Buck Trucker in Rowdy Business
summary: Buck Trucker must gamble and sweet-talk his way through The Golden Palm Casino, Las Vegas, to save an orphanage back home‚Äîor succumb to Sin City's many temptations in this choice-driven story featuring mini-games, multiple endings, and a cast of outlandish characters.

name: Buy a Croquette!
summary: March 2012, Nagano. The brave and clever high school girl, Chio Aozora, is facing a major crisis: she doesn‚Äôt have enough money to buy a croquette! Navigate through the streets and alleys of Nagano, interact with a variety of characters, solve complex puzzles, collect 380 yen, and buy a croquette!

name: Bubble Bobble 4 Friends: The Baron Is Back!
summary: The Bubble Bobble series bursts back onto the stage, with a wholly new entry for the first time in 24 years! Face off against a wide range of new bosses in new environments, with revamped bubble-blowing gameplay.

name: Bulb Out
summary: Lights On.. 3..2..1.. Lights Off..3..2..1.. Lights on..3.. WATCH OUT!! Whew!.. That was a close one! You almost hit that obstacle! Pay attention to the screen when the lights are on because when they shut off‚Ä¶.you are on your own‚Ä¶! Tap the floating stars, balls, and coins to get extra boosts! Earn Achievements along the way! Play in dual screen mode if you dare! Test your reflexes in this casual fast paced arcade game!

name: Buildest
summary: Take on the role of an architect in different historical eras. Lead a brigade of honest hard workers to build it - from modest hovels for peasants to pompous skyscrapers of megacities.

name: Bubble Bobble
summary:
This is an enhanced port of the original version for the SEGA Master System/Mark III.

The game now has 200 levels, new items like the peacock feather, blue book, and a blue crystal chalice have been added, and there are also 2 new mini-boss fights. The game also has hidden rooms which allows players to rack up bonus points and find items that are needed to see the best ending. The endings themselves have been changed to be a bit more cinematic.

Super Bubble Bobble is a mode in the original version that happened after the player beat the original set of levels and had to beat them again with the enemies being swapped around. Beating this would allow the player to see the true ending. This version of the game lacks this mode as the 200 levels are considered one playthrough.

name: Burning Birds
summary:
Do you ever feel like a bird on a wire?

Burning Birds is a fun and addictive game where you control birds laying eggs from an electric wire while avoiding electric shocks.

name: BugSquash
summary: You are a professional Bug Squasher. Clients reach out to you with their pest problems, and you'll respond to increasingly challenging infestations. With each successful job, you'll earn money to upgrade and expand your equipment and take on bigger, badder bugs.

name: Bullet Soul Infinite Burst
summary: Bullet Soul Infinite Burst is a vertically scrolling shooting game crossing old-school gameplay with a bullet hell twist. It adds numerous gameplay enhancements over its predecessor, Bullet Soul, not least of which is Burst Mode. The same aggressive, bullet-cancelling gameplay, now with more destruction, more coins and more tunes. Shooting fans, it's time to welcome back the true Japanese shooting experience!

name: Burning Out
summary: In Burning Out, a multiplayer maze-escape game, you and up to 3 others are trapped in a dark maze, armed only with fire. Light your way with your torch to unveil the maze's secrets, all while trying to keep contact with prox chat. (it is highly recommended to play with others)

name: Bubbler
summary: Bubble up in Bubbler, the bubbliest farming game of your dreams as you unbubble the wondrous world of The Bubbles. Gamble your earnings for bubbly accessories, buy your very own bubble pets and upgrade your skills as you expand your farm.

name: Bunny Memory
summary: Train your memory in a 3D game with the bunnies alone or together with a friend. Collect memory points to unlock fragments of memories.

name: Build a Game Universe
summary: Build a Game Universe is your spot to build, play, share and sell your 2D games and game content. Whether you are an experienced developer or just getting started, our intuitively designed tools create a fun and exciting environment to bring your imagination to life!

name: Bug Fables: Aphid Festival
summary: The second game in the Bug Fables franchise. This time, it's a clicker game about farming aphids. Get your aphid to level ten through training with Tanjerin, and mealtimes with Kut.

name: Bubbly's Symphony: Guardians of the Depths
summary: Join Bubbly on an epic journey through the depths of the ocean in "Bubbly's Symphony: Guardians of the Depths"! As a guardian of the sea, navigate through stunning underwater worlds and combat pollution in a quest to save marine life. Share your results on social media directly from the game.

name: Bullet: Surge
summary: Bullet is an electrifying mix of Puzzle and Action! Assume the role of charismatic heroines, each bringing their own flair and unique gameplay to the game. Defeat all Bosses solo or bring the fight online!

name: Bubble Investor
summary: Bubble Investor is an investment game in which you run a bubble company and your goal is to achieve the maximum return from them without the bubble bursting.

name: Bud Spencer & Terence Hill: Slaps and Beans 2
summary: The second chapter of the official video game of Bud Spencer and Terence Hill

name: Bunny Cubed
summary: Hop your way through dozens of springtime puzzle stages in isometric 3D style!

name: Burrows
summary: Play as a crew of moles sent to dig for precious minerals to fuel the industrial revolution for the animal kingdom.

name: Burly Men at Sea: Maestro Beard Edition
summary:
A branching folktale misadventure about a trio of large, bearded fishermen. Shape a custom tale that begins again where it ends, through waters where lurk creatures from Scandinavian folklore.

The Beard Edition includes the game and soundtrack.

name: Bump Guardian
summary: Bump Guardian is a casual deck-building defense game about protecting a growing life. Build your deck, repel incoming threats, and progress through the stages of pregnancy.

name: Bubble Shooter Pop!
summary:
Welcome to Bubble Shooter Pop! ‚Äì a brand new addictive bubble shooter game by MobilityWare! No pop-ups, no gimmicks, and no in-app purchases. Enjoy endless free classic bubble shooter levels and hours of fun. Relax your mind in this meditative yet challenging bubble pop game!

Match 3 colors, break tricky obstacles and use rechargeable power-ups to beat joyful and challenging levels. Special bubbles will enhance the gameplay: some of them are hard to overcome, others are a player‚Äôs best friend!

It is the most joyous bubble shooter game on the App Store. A thoughtful, relaxing, friction-free experience with endless play! Come along now and join the fun!

name: ButcherBox
summary: How long can you last in a box flooding with vicious monsters? Pretty weapons might distract you, but not them. You're gonna have to prove your metal. Challenge your friends, challenge the world. Fight for rank! Did I mention the lead is unlimited?

name: Bucket Knight
summary: Even knights still have to pay taxes, loans and alimony. Help the brave knight in his sacred mission to find the Holy Grail (and then sell it). Explore dungeons, slay enemies, avoid traps, stay alive and get rich!

name: Butty Buttbear's Big Butty Blast
summary: Survival horror game, inspired by the FNAF series.

name: Buggos
summary: Buggos is an RTS Auto Battler where you direct a bug swarm to conquer the planet from the dirty resident humans! You unlock evolution points when defeating the humans in battle allowing you to customize your bug swarm. You are the bad guys! You are the evil bugs! You are here for blood!

name: Bussy Master: Cyberbussy 2069
summary: In Cyberbussy 2069, dive into a futuristic underworld teeming with cyber-enhanced hunks ready to fulfill your darkest cravings. Tackle intense, erotic puzzles, unlock steamy characters, and build your futuristic gallery. Neon nights, augmented bodies, and endless pleasure await. Are you ready?

name: Burnogue
summary: Lead. Burn. Conquer.

name: Burnin' Rubber 3
summary:
Rule the world in this fast-driving, explosive racing extravaganza! Play the Daily Challenge or take on the globe in World Domination! Burnin' Rubber 3 is filled with fast cars and explosive challenges. Are you ready to dominate the world?

Burnin' Rubber 3 is the first game to ever feature weapons in the Burnin' Rubber series.

The player is supposed to dominate the world by completing many different challenges on five different continents, America, Asia, Africa, Europe, and Australia (also a country that has one mission).

The player starts in America with the Phaser GTI equipped with a Machine Gun, but once they complete more challenges, they can unlock more vehicles, such as the Rebel, Inferno 66, Panther V8, and more.

The player can unlock weapons such as the Mini Gun, Grenade Layer, Grenade Launcher, and others.

Since March 2017, this game was removed from the game portal Shockwave.com due to the deprecation of NPAPI plugins on modern browsers. On March 19, 2018, Xform released the Burnin' Rubber 3 standalone.

name: Buddi Bot: Your Machine Learning AI Helper With Advanced Neural Networking!
summary: Buddi Bot is an isometric puzzle game where you must (re)train Buddi Bot, an advanced AI with neural network technology. With just a click, Buddi will complete tasks like washing dishes or cooking a steak, by learning COLORS and SHAPES. Are you prepared for the future? Play and find out.

name: Bulletstorm: Duke Nukem's Bulletstorm Tour
summary:
Play through the entire Bulletstorm: Full Clip Edition campaign as Duke Nukem, featuring a fully rerecorded script and brand-new lines from the original voice of Duke!
Bulletstorm: Full Clip Edition game required to use this content.

name: Bubsy: Paws on Fire!
summary:
From the developers of the BIT.TRIP series comes Bubsy: Paws on Fire!, the latest and greatest in bobcat-based gaming.

Bubsy is back in his greatest adventure yet! Featuring four playable characters with their own unique playstyles, new moves never before seen in a Bubsy title, and over 100 levels and variations, Paws on Fire is a game for Bubsy lovers everywhere!

name: Burnin' Rubber 5
summary:
Burnin' Rubber 5 is the fifth title in the Burnin' Rubber series which was first released on April 23, 2013.

The player starts with the A7, and weapons like the Machine Gun or the Rocket Launcher, but once it completes more challenges, they can unlock more vehicles, such as the Rebel, Eagle, Vice, and more.

And in terms of weapons, the player can unlock weapons such as the Mini Gun, Fuel Air Rocket Launcher, Laser Turret, and more. Also seen are special weapons, which are turrets that can rotate 360 degrees to attack enemies at all times.

name: Bust-A-Move 2: Arcade Edition
summary:
Bub and Bob are back! Like in Tetris in reverse, you shoot bubbles at an array of different-colored bubbles stuck in an ever descending ceiling, attempting to match them up three by three to make them disappear.

This edition contains both puzzle challenges, multiplayer and normal progressive stages.

name: Buster Baxter: Lung Defender
summary: Buster Baxter: Lung Defender is a game on the Arthur page of the PBS Kids website. It is based on the episode "Buster's Breathless."

name: BumpUpGhostBuster
summary: This is a one-player horror game in which you must defeat the ghosts that lurk in the field. Search for invisible ghosts by relying on sound, and defeat them without being found by the ghosts. If the ghost finds you

name: Burial Ground
summary: Burial Ground is a heavily gameplay-driven custom story that's built to emulate the feeling of playing Amnesia: The Bunker for the first time, with an emphasis on high randomness, replayability, and gameplay that rewards exploration and playstyle.

name: Business Tour: Great Leaders - Napoleon
summary: He majestically walks over conquered lands. He holds his head proudly. He directs his victorious gaze towards new territories. He sets the goal. He reaches one. His main gift to you is a sense of distinctiveness. You'll also get 100 gold and 50,000 chips.

name: Burial of Shortcake
summary: "The Burial of Shortcake" is an unpredictable story. It is a new visual novel with characters which are created/designed by voice actor Nozomi Sasaki, whose "expressiveness" shines throughout her career as a performer.

name: Building Block Heroes
summary: Building Block Heroes is a puzzle platformer in which you use coloured blocks to build pathways around each level to free the Jollyfolk from their cages. Simultaneously control both building blocks and heroes, with a friend or by yourself, as you construct your own means to save them!

name: Butterfly's Poison: Blood Chains
summary: Yuriko, a noblewoman in the Taisho Era, has a big party on her birthday. She then discovers her father is trying to find her a rich husband at the party, but she doesn't want to have that fate. Suddenly, some rogues break into her place and start trashing the place. She grabs a wooden sword so she can fight them, but a man saves her...

name: Button Cat
summary: [Button Cat] is a comprehensive game that consists of several mini-games [horizontal board jumping, snake eating, jerking off, big fish eating small fish] connected into a plot

name: Buggy
summary: Buggy is a cute bug-collection game. Play as Fenny to catch bugs around Critter Island, fill your collection book, customize your character, and hang out with friends!

name: Bunkers 1944 FPS
summary: Infiltrate. Eliminate. Obliterate.

name: Butterfly Soup
summary:
A visual novel about gay asian girls playing baseball and falling in love.

Features:
- harold they're lesbians*
- 3-4 hours long
- memes

name: Bullet Strike
summary: Nintendo Switch Exclusive! Face extreme heart-pounding missions on chemical plant battlefields! Dominate with tanks and combat!

name: Builder Flipper Bundle
summary: A bundle of House Flipper and Builder Simulator.

name: Buffy the Vampire Slayer: Wrath of the Darkhul King
summary: The stakes are high as players assume the role of the world's most fetching foe of the forces of darkness in THQ's Buffy the Vampire Slayer: Wrath of the Darkhul King on Game Boy Advance. Buffy hunts loathsome legions through 16 twilit levels before confronting the ultimate evil in the form of the Darkhul King. This side-scroller is crammed with interactive environments -- a fancy phrase meaning you get to break lots of stuff, like doors, crates, spider webs, vases, benches and even stone walls.

name: Bura: The Way the Wind Blows
summary: Explore the beautiful Adriatic coast, live as part of a small community and roam among the spirits of Mediterranean old-folk tales. Level up your character and make meaningful choices as the legends you're told come to life. Every decision is important, truth or lie, it is on you to decide.

name: Burn the Corn
summary:
Be aware! Evil Moisture will send many Water Babies to stand in your way! These minions from the Realm of Moisture have the power to nature your Magic Flame! You should demonstrate your skill by moving around it gracefully while turning the baby corns into delicious popcorn!

There are times when the anxious baby corns burst out all at once! This is the moment where you can use some help from your powerful allies! The Fire Warrior can combine with your Magic Flame to strengthen your power while the Time Wizard can slow down time to give you some breathing room. You will discover many more exciting elements and learn how to use them to your advantage throughout this magical journey!

Now! Let us work together to help the baby corns to make their dreams come true!!

name: Bugs Bunny
summary: A handheld game based on the cartoon character Bugs Bunny.

name: Buried Alive: Breathless Rescue
summary: Are you ready to embark on a spine-chilling adventure? Step into the shoes of the protagonist and experience the terror of being "Buried Alive" in a crypt. Your mission is clear: Escape the confines of your coffin, find the key to unlock the door, and unveil the dark secrets that lie within.

name: Bullyparade: Der Spiel
summary:
For the 20th anniversary of the legendary comedy show, Bully & Co are coming back to the big cinema screen. And on your mobile!

Meet the famous characters and fight yourself as a chieftain, blood brother, empress, emperor, Captain Kork or Mr. Spuck through the fascinating environments of the movie in this unique game.

BULLYPARADE - DER FILM (THE MOVIE) is an exciting jump'n'run game where speed, skill and anger can lead to success! Play against other players and enjoy being part of the fun world of Bully!

name: Bus Flipper Simulator
summary: Have you ever wondered ‚ÄúWhat if I buy an old bus and convert it into a camper? Or maybe a cafe on wheels?‚Äù. This bus conversion simulator will give you that! You will get a variety of different buses and vans to convert. Clean, destroy, create, customize, test it, sell and make profit!

name: Butterflowers
summary: A digital playground where you can drag and drop images from your computer to plant flowers, grow vines, start fires and upload color into an expansive network of butterflowers! Uncover the memories of a past inhabitant as you explore the evolving space of the ecosystem and breathe new life from your files and interactions with the terrain.

name: BubbleBeast DigiDungeon
summary: Pop bubbles, fight monsters, and keep rocking to the beat. Get into the flow with unique puzzle-rhythm mechanics across 5 vibrant levels. Match colored bubbles, defuse the Beasts‚Äô attacks, and don't let that combo meter break.

name: Bubble Shooter
summary: Bubble Shooter is an untimed bubble-popping strategy game with a classic interface and arcade special effects noises.

name: Bubble Dreams 3D
summary:
Gogi the rabbit has misplaced his collection of precious rainbow gems... and they've all fallen into several different 3D dream worlds!

Using his magic bubble ball, help Gogi get his gems back by rolling, drifting, bouncing, and boosting your way through a handful of shiny platforming stages without falling off!

name: Bunny's Flowers
summary: A cute puzzle game about taking a trip to your grandma. Overcome box-pushing challenges using your mysterious magical power.

name: Bully Ball Brigade
summary: Simple mini games for all, roguelike for the experienced.

name: Burger Master
summary: Burger Master is a fun game where you need to create the best burger joint in town. In order to do that, you must do your best and bring in the best skills you have to fulfill the needs of your clients. This is an intense, fun and exciting game that constantly tests your cooking skills. There are 3 worlds in the game, with 60 different levels in each world. That gives plenty of opportunities to test out your experience and push it to the next level. As you play, you can use one of the 3 power-ups like Customer Happy Time, Coin Magnet and Automatic Hinting. All of these play a great role as you try to become better and better. There are 21 customer types, each one with their own unique requirements. You can even unlock ingredients, power-ups and characters as you go along. If you love great cooking games, try out Burger Master today and have fun preparing some amazing burgers!

name: Buddy Simulator 1984
summary: Thanks to next generation AI technology, BUDDY SIMULATOR 1984 simulates the experience of hanging out with a best buddy! Your buddy learns from you, constantly adapting to your interests and personality. But most importantly, your buddy can play games with you!

name: Bub's Puzzle Blast!
summary:
The legendary masterpiece, the combination of the Bubble Bobble & Puzzle Blast!
The legendary masterpiece, the perfect combination of the nostalgic Bubble Bobble and Puzzle Blast!
Defeat monsters with original characters from the original series.
Use your brain and try to reach the top of the Rainbow Tower with colorful bubbles moving in the air.
Destroy monsters and obstacles by popping bubbles of the same color and making Special Bubbles!
Rescue your enchanted friends and join forces to build your own Miniroon Town.

name: Bumblebee: Spooky Nights
summary: A story-driven 3D exploration game where you guide a little bee in search of a new home.

name: Bubble Tea Revolution
summary: Run your own bubble tea shop! Take customer orders, purchase ingredients, prepare delicious drinks, serve your customers and become the ultimate Boba Master!

name: Burgaholic
summary: A platforming game about collecting burgers!

name: Bum Fights
summary:
Get ready to brawl like never before in Bum Fights! Jump into the ultimate online multiplayer top-down shooter set in a nostalgic medieval world, where you rise from rags to riches as a penniless warrior fighting for survival and glory.

Experience fast paced action and intense combat as you battle other players in the arena, or team up to take on hordes of the undead. Arm yourself with a variety of weapons, from rusty knives to throwing rocks, and fight until you're the last one standing.

But beware: the competition is fierce, and only the strongest and most skilled will emerge victorious. With customizable characters and diverse game modes, there's always a new challenge around the corner.

Gear up for battle and enter the arena to prove your worth as the Lord of the Bums!

name: Bunny Clicker
summary: Bunny Clicker is a cozy idle game where you can raise your cute bunnies on a small farm. Breed them, feed and play with them to earn more carrots and improve their quality of life.

name: Bubble Bust Extreme
summary:
Bubble Bust Extreme is the most addictive bubble matching game.
It‚Äôs very easy to play, just tap on the screen to shoot the bubble. But it‚Äôs really hard to pass all 180 challenge levels. Try to match as many same color bubbles together as you can for extra points.

name: Burnin' Rubber Crash n' Burn
summary: Crash n' Burn is all about destruction. Cars, phone booths, vending machines...everything is a target! Complete missions to move on to the next level. Go on a rampage through the city firing weapons and crashing through obstacles to cause maximum damage. The more havoc you wreak, the more money you make. But be careful - gun turrets are aiming for you and too much damage to your vehicle will end your rampage. Level up and use your hard-won cash to buy more vehicles and gadgets, change your destruction style, or add upgrades to your car in the safehouse.

name: Builder's Block
summary:
Builder's Block (known as "LandMaker" in Japan and Europe) is a puzzle game in which you must construct buildings and then eliminate them for points. Although a certain color can only eliminate itself, the object of this game is to match colored blocks together to form buildings. Once you have made a building, you can eliminate it by shooting a block on the corner of it. The larger the building, the more benefits you'll reap when you destroy it!

The game can be played three different ways: Puzzle mode, Battle mode, and Arcade mode. In the Puzzle mode, you must travel to one of seven different courses and construct specific size buildings. You must not destroy the buildings in this mode. The object is to build cities for the specific course or region you're in and make the cities grow.

name: Bust a Block 2
summary:
From the makers of The Jumping Food Games comes the sequel to the popular puzzle game "Bust a Block". In this expansion you can expect 25 new, tricky levels in which the aim is to destroy cleverly arranged blocks with just one shot!

What can you expect in "Bust a Block 2"?

Challenging puzzle gameplay: Every action counts! Find the perfect angle and place your shot strategically to destroy all the blocks at once.

25 cleverly designed levels: Experience an ever-increasing challenge where each level surprises you with increasingly complicated block formations.

Tactics and skill: Think carefully about how you place your shot - one mistake and the blocks will stop! Will you master all the levels?

Can you make the perfect shot and destroy all the blocks in one go? Prove your skill and become the master in "Bust a Block 2"!

name: Bus Simulator 21: Next Stop - Official School Bus Extension
summary: Attention all Angel Shores and Seaside Valley bus drivers! It's time to get back into the driver's seat and take on a new challenge as the new school year approaches. Transport your town's kids to their schools safely and in time for their lessons!

name: Bulb Boy 2: Jar of Despair
summary: Bulb Boy defeated the evil that had overtaken the Bulbhouse and his beloved family. But it seems that this is only the beginning of his dark adventures! And this time, it all starts with an empty jam jar...

name: Build-A-Putt
summary: Build and play your own mini-golf courses with up to 8 players. Save courses for later or build them as you go.

name: Bunker Wars
summary:
Bunker Wars: WW1 Strategy is a real-time strategy war game with multiplayer! Gather an army, participate in epic PVP battles, devise your own tactics for victory, and become the best in tower defense!

In the midst of a world war, defend your base from enemies and break through their defenses. Upgrade your bunkers and expand your territories by sending an army to capture strangers. Install towers and distribute troops to different targets.
Strategize in every battle, bypass trenches, upgrade your base, and capture all enemy structures to win this epic RTS game!

name: Butasan
summary: The object of Psycho Pigs UXB is to eliminate your opponents (who are pigs) by throwing bombs at them. When thrown, the bombs will count down from the number shown on the bomb, exploding when they reach zero or when they hit their target, whichever comes first. Items can be picked up along the way that will help you defeat opponents, like a knapsack that allows you to carry more than one bomb at a time. After certain levels, a bonus game appears, and the object of this game is to attempt to kiss the lady pigs as they pop in and out of holes.

name: Burnout Drift
summary: Are you a drift master? Prove your skills in Burnout Drift!

name: Button VR
summary: Button VR is a game where the core idea is to press the button to progress to the next level with each new level having increasingly harder puzzles and new content to solve.

name: Buck Bradley: Comic Adventure
summary: A comic-book style graphic adventure!Puzzles, brainteasers and plenty of laughs!

name: BunnyBarTalk
summary: Bunny Bar Talk is a quick and fun command-input mini-game. Get to know the girls at Bunny Bar!

name: Bullpen
summary:
A clean, logic-based puzzle game where every bull must be placed just right.

It's like Sudoku meets Minesweeper.

name: Buzz!: Quiz TV
summary: Buzz! Quiz TV marks the debut of Sony's party-quiz series, Buzz!, to the PlayStation 3; adding the ability for players to compete online as well as write their own questions and exchange quiz packs online.

name: Buzz-Saw Blood House
summary: A deep web community celebrates Halloween with a twisted "Red Room" livestream. Young girls are kidnapped, and forced to navigate a house full of deadly traps for the viewer‚Äôs entertainment.

name: Bug Butcher
summary: Bug butcher is a roguelite action game with random locations, dynamic gameplay and tons of bugs.

name: Buzz! Junior: Jungle Party
summary: Buzz! Junior: Jungle Party will captivate the young and casual gamer through over a variety of competitive mini-games. Each mini-game offers a variety of fun fast paced gameplay of skill and speed that will appeal to the entire family -- from the young to the young at heart.

name: Bugs
summary:
This little game came in a standalone cassette as a free game with the fourteenth issue of the Spanish magazine "Todo Sobre El Amstrad", which roughly translates to "All About Amstrad".

In this game, it's all about shooting down pesky bugs. Also, the music is from the game "Flight Path 737"

name: Bumpers & Dragons
summary: Drop balls. Slay dragons. Peggle meets Balatro in a pachinko roguelite where physics meets strategy. Engineer your luck and push deep into procedurally generated dungeons.

name: Burger World
summary: make some burgers for the hungry masses

name: Bufonada
summary: An adventure full of puzzles and humour, where you play the role of two characters: a useless jester and a half-crazy magic goat, entangled in a mission that is too big for them.

name: Bunker Defense
summary: Bunker Defense is a tower defense game for 1-4 players. Waves of enemies attack your base, and you must defend it by building different kinds of defenses.

name: Bulbs 2.0
summary:
Combine color mixing and logic for some puzzle-solving fun in Bulbs 2.0, featuring over 100 stimulating levels to solve!

Red plus blue makes purple, blue plus yellow makes green, and white contains every color. In Bulbs 2.0, you‚Äôll combine the satisfying art of color mixing with logic for a truly stimulating puzzle game experience!

Your board is filled with colored bulbs that will reverse their specific share of light on their own cell, along with the surrounding eight. If you ‚Äúreverse‚Äù a red bulb, a neighboring blue one will change to purple. Any nearby purple ones? Those will swap back to blue! Your goal is straightforward, but challenging: Swap the colors until the entire board is white. With a limited number of moves and more than 100 levels of varying size, can you illuminate your way through the game?

name: Bulb Boy
summary: One gloomy night, Bulb Boy wakes suddenly from a frightening nightmare to discover that evil has overshadowed the Bulbhouse. His family has disappeared and there are horrid monsters lurking in the shadows. Gather the courage and use his glass head to save everything he loves.

name: Bunny Girls
summary: Many cute girls with bunny ears appear! An easy puzzle game that anyone can play!

name: Bubsy 4D
summary: The infamous, wise-cracking bobcat has returned to 3D in a new platforming adventure. Bubsy is back with new challenges, new moves, and even more purrsonality. Run, jump, glide, and roll across alien planets, battle robotic sheep, and collect tons and tons of yarn. What could possibly go wrong?

name: Buck 'n Grunts Bundle
summary: Guts 'n Grunts and Buck Blastem -- two excellent, retro-styled, 16-bit platform games together in one epic bundle!

name: Bunch of Heroes
summary: The Bunch is the most formidable team of elite fighters ever assembled from around the world. What brought them together? Well, obviously the Earth is under attack! An alien invasion is threatening all humankind, without regards to gender, color or nationality. And these nasty aliens have a powerful Zombie Army at their disposal!

name: Bus World
summary: Bus World is a game about passenger transportations in various conditions, starting from standard days of a bus driver and ending with rescuing people who suffered from disasters.

name: Burya v Stakane: Honky na Marshrutkakh
summary:
The operational situation in the vast expanses of the Far Northern Galaxy has become much more complicated. Persons of unknown nationality are operating everywhere. The production of illegal alcohol has been established on secret planets on a galactic scale.

In the game Storm in a Teacup: Minibus Racing, two seasoned employees of the Krishna Operatives sect are sent to carry out a complex of operational-search activities.

To restore order in the region, the operatives will have to solve many problems: free Princess Zadolballa, assemble a proton torpedo, and stop the illegal production of robotics.

And in the meantime, find the Chosen One, whose appearance was predicted by the Oracle, rescue the great and secret Ch., steal a starship - in a word, demonstrate operational ingenuity.

And our heroes will be helped by talented racers: rapper Nikolai Beldyev, the beautiful Zhuzhu, the young and very promising Enikey Skovorodker and others.

name: Burger Restaurant Simulator
summary: Join Burger Restaurant Simulator for delicious moments! Enjoy making hamburgers with great graphics and rich content.

name: Bubble Bobble Plus!
summary: Bubble Bobble Plus! is a remake of the original Bubble Bobble released for WiiWare.

name: Burger Bistro Story
summary:
Open your own diner and create custom burgers in this management sim game.
Get ready to experience a new fast food sensation! Create your own diner and grill your way to success. Create different recipes and offer your patrons a truly customized experience!

name: Burning Rubber
summary:
Despite the smutty title, the only ‚Äòbig people‚Äô requirement is a driving license, as you‚Äôre racing through Europe and America in a variety of cars. Each level has a visual background reflecting part of the country.

The route is mapped out beforehand, but it needn‚Äôt be strictly adhered to, as the surrounding roads are all presented and can be used as you wish. The computer cars in the race will often deviate from the course as well, adding real navigation to the proceedings. You accrue damage from contact, which needs to be repaired after the race, so you need to keep some prize money coming in.

The racing is illegal, so you are pursued by police as you go, similarly to Crazy Cars 3, so make sure not to get caught, and do your dangerous driving out of their sight. You‚Äôll have to drive on the correct side of the road and negotiate pedestrians and other traffic as well

name: Bujingai: The Forsaken City
summary:
An isolated island-city stands as home to much of what remains of the human race. The ancient technology which annihilated most of the earth has now opened a gateway to a hellish dimension, unleashing a horde of demons upon the city.

One warrior, armed with a pair of swords and an arsenal of magic spells, goes to battle the army of demons.

This warrior's name is Lau, and thousands will die by his hand.

name: Bug√óBug
summary:
The main character, Gumi, a small streamer, is often high thanks to drinking alcohol and taking drugs.
He makes fun of creators who were even smaller than him.
Gumi is aware that he is a total scumbag, but he just can't quit.
‚Äï‚ÄïThere is only one person who could accept him even though he is a piece of trash.

A short BL game about two faulty vloggers.

name: Business Tour: Football - Forward Number 7
summary: Victory is always around you! Guru of motivation will explain to you why fortitude and self-improvement are important. He will teach you how to turn on your handsome-man mode, and how to go only forward to victory! And of course your self-confidence will grow. Dice, 100 gold and 50.000 chips will only contribute to this.

name: Bubble Wizard II Saga
summary:
Return to OZ: The Shadow‚Äôs Revenge
Peace has returned to OZ Wizard Country‚Äîor so it seemed. Just as the land begins to heal, a new darkness emerges from the ruins of the Dark Sorcerer‚Äôs lair. A forgotten curse has awakened the Shadow Queen, an even greater force of evil that threatens to plunge OZ into eternal night!

name: Buggy Run
summary:
Buggy Run is a game that lets players race dune buggies in a championship over 15 possible tracks (plus 4 in 2 player mode) each winning money that can be used for dune buggy upgrades. There are 4 different modes that can be played in single player mode that includes Race, Vs Com, Freerun, and Battle.

In the main mode Race the player is given $20,000 starting cash that can be used to upgrade the buggy. The upgradable features of the buggy are Tyres (grip), Engine (speed), Suspension (limits bounce), Steering (cornering), Transmission (performance). All the upgrades cost $10,000 for level 2, $30,000 for level 3, and $50,000 for level 4 however the player doesn‚Äôt need to get them in order. There are also special upgrades to buy that includes $5000 for a mine (drops behind and if another car hits then it is blown up until reset), $5000 for Nitoro (gives the players car a short speed boost), and $10,000 for extra capacity of special items (starts with 2 slots to a max of 6). Special Items must be used in the order they're placed in the slots.

name: Business Simulator
summary: Business simulator is a simple economic simulator. Making their way forward, the player builds the future of their character, earning money and respect, buying real estate, cars, and climbing the career ladder.

name: Burnin' Rubber 5 Air
summary:
Burnin' Rubber 5 Air is a lite version of the original game which was released on April 9, 2020.

The player is supposed to complete many different challenges. Due to the game being a splitscreen multiplayer game, the player has to find other players to play the game with.

The player starts with your first four cars: the A7, Bullet 350, Rebel, Petite XS, and weapons like the Heavy Machine Gun or the Striker Launcher, but once it completes more challenges they can unlock more vehicles, such as the Mule, Macari, Vice and more.

And in terms of weapons, the player can unlock weapons such as the Mini Gun, Fuel Air Rocket Launcher, Shotgun and more.
