You lose when three cubes pile up on any pile.
Just tap on the moving bubbles, cubes and spiky bubbles to remove them from their path.
The more piles you have to build simultaneously the more challenging it gets.

name: Bubble Pop World
summary: Bubble Pop World is a 3D match-three game in which you pop bubbles with the same colors.

name: Burgerline
summary: A rhythm-based burger assembly simulator.

name: Bulldozer Bob
summary: Bulldozer Bob it's a Digger clone. Players control the Bulldozer that can tunnel through dirt with ease. The goal of each level is to gather up each of the gems, which allows you to progress to the next stage.

name: Bunny & Piggy
summary: Bunny & Piggy is a lovely simple platformer where you can choose the main character - bunny or piggy. There will be both difficult and not so difficult levels. But hurry up! Frosty winter is coming and you have to gather as much food as possible.

name: Burger Cats
summary: Burger Cats is a hamburger making simulator with a cat.

name: Bubble Land
summary: Russian arcade game inspired in Bubble Bobble.

name: Bunch of Heroes: Holiday Pack
summary: These holidays the zombies and aliens of Bunch of Heroes have been naughty, and Santa has a very special present for them: Hot Lead. Enter Santa, the jolly man from the north with his special Jollygun. Santa joins Agent Liu, Jared Joe, El Camarada and Captain Smith fighting for Earth's survival against the alien invaders and their zombie...

name: Business Runner
summary: Business Runner! This exciting 3D arcade game puts you in the shoes of a businesswoman racing through the city, collecting coffee cups and overcoming obstacles on her path to success.

name: Bubble Shooter: Classic Pop
summary: Rethink the bubble shooter genre and blast your way to victory with Bouncing Bubbles! Download this endlessly entertaining arcade shooter, start shooting away at rows of bubbles, and discover exactly how addicting bouncing bubbles level in and level out can be!

name: Bubu Kong Goes Bananas
summary: "Bubu Kong Goes Bananas" is a modern solo adventure, blending classic Arcade game nostalgia with dynamic environments and epic boss battles for a thrilling banana-collecting experience.

name: Bullet Destroyer
summary: Destroy hordes of enemies and try to survive as much as possible. Bullet Destroyer is a first person shooter where you have to fight against hordes of enemies.

name: Bus Stop
summary: A pocket-sized intro to a whodunnit involving you, your phone, and the people at the bus stop you sleep at.

name: Butter Royale
summary: Have the food fight of your life in the #1 battle royale game on Arcade! Play solo or in squads against 31 others in fast-paced 5 minute food fights. Fire sauce-shooting, bread-blasting tools and knock out your opponents with food! Use Power-Ups to heal your squad or trap your opponents in a flood of thick, delicious milkshake!

name: Bury Me With The Rain
summary: Bury me with the rain is an interactive short story about the life, friendship and struggle of Jean and Avery. Follow their journey of hardship, joy and heartfelt conversation as they try to find meaning for their own lives.

name: Build & Feast Collection
summary: Build. Eat. Repeat.

name: Bus Simulator 21: Next Stop - Christmas Skin Pack
summary: Oh deer, Christmas is here! Christmas inspired buses are coming to Angel Shores and Seaside Valley to celebrate the most festive of seasons. Customize your bus and make it your own with this Christmas themed skin pack.

name: Bullet
summary: Bullet is a top down Action Arcade game. You have one shot at killing your enemies. Dodge and weave through each level, gain points and upgrade your abilities. You have one shot... Make it count.

name: Buffet Knight
summary: A short Action/Adventure game following the gluttonous Buffet Knight who gobbles up everything and spits them back at his foes. Grow bigger and bigger to face the evil Demon Chef, but who knows what can happen when your appetite grows out of control‚Ä¶

name: Buoyant
summary: How long can you survive in this abstract game of survival? Surf the endless wave, avoiding enemies and collecting rings. Simple one-button gameplay, enjoyable wave physics and a sublime soundtrack combine to make an addictive and challenging score-based game.

name: Bulanci: Hero Factory
summary: The Hero Factory, where you can choose the right pattern and colour for your Bulanci. You can highlight the nature of your killer pillow with sunglasses, an eyepatch, a baseball cap, or leather gloves, to name but a few.

name: Bus Fix 2019
summary:
Have you ever wondered what it's like to be a mechanic? What if you could repair buses?
Accept the repair buses oreders.
Diagnose, replace or fix damaged part of buses.
Disassemble for example engine parts, chassis parts, tires.
Buy new parts.

In a game you will find:
- 6 different buses.
- More than 50 part that yoou can replace by yourself.
- Different defects to remove.
- An unlimited number of orders for execution.
- Richly equipped workshop.

name: Bubble Burst: PlayWithPlanets
summary:
Bubble pairing and popping takes a new dimension in this game. Pair similar planets in a dial and see how much you can pop in a minute or more.
Easy controls and special effects make this game and awesome time killer.
Multiple levels in this game is a plus point and each level gives you a new experience every time you play.

name: Burrito Bison: Launcha Libre
summary: The third entry in the gummy bear smashing Burrito Bison series.

name: Business Tour: Great Leaders - Cleopatra
summary: Brush up your leopard grace, get the gold of all the desert sands and the greatness of the sun as a bonus. It's Cleopatra! The great queen of Egypt is ready to give you the vacant seat of her favorite cat. Together you will bring everyone to their knees within a radius of the Business Tour.

name: Bunni Gunni Classic
summary: They took your kids... Take their lives! Bunni Gunni Classic is a much needed polishing for the game jam game made in 4 days!

name: Bubble Struggle: Adventures
summary: Classic arcade game from the original Bubble Trouble creator.

name: Burning Angels
summary: Evil forces have kidnapped the leader of the Burning Project! It's up to the Burning Angels to rescue her! And so starts another vertically scrolling shooter on the PC Engine. There are no surprises in the gameplay here - choose one of two ships, shoot down enemies and collect power upgrades and energy pods. Levels range from the city to the desert and the obligatory sci-fi enemy base. At the end of each level, defeat the large boss craft to move on.

name: Bullet Bill Simulator
summary: A ROM hack of Super Mario 64. Survive and collect as many coins for as long as you can in the average day-to-day life of a Bullet Bill!

name: Built for Speed
summary: Built for Speed is the best retro-racing game available for your mobile device today! Beat your friends and the top players on player made tracks; rise to the top of the league to prove you're the champion.

name: Bunk.Town
summary: Survive the pandemic, and get in the Bunker!

name: Bunny Hop
summary: A simple platformer about a rabbit, which needs to collect carrots in order to move to the next level.

name: Bubbles Popper 2
summary:
Destroy as many bubbles as possible to move to the next level.
Select group of 2 or more same colored bubbles and they will disappear adding point to you.
Number of point for each removed bubble depends on number of bubbles in the removed group.

name: Bustout
summary: Super bustout is a unique TRS-80 Color Computer game for one to four people. It's your job to break down a wall on the screen by knocking out individual bricks, gaining points for each one you destroy. You can play all alone, with a partner, or against as many as three other competitors.

name: Bumpkin and Sprout
summary: Embark on an unforgettable 3D platformer adventure in "Bumpkin & Sprout," where action, humor, and environmental awareness unite! Join these two whimsical mushrooms on a mission to save not only themselves but also Nature herself from the clutches of the nefarious Pollution Spirit.

name: Bubblegum Bandit
summary: With the power of gravity manipulation and bubblegum, the Bubblegum Bandit wreaks havoc and takes revenge! Steal from evil robots and blow up their ships!

name: Buggerworld
summary: Hark! CLOWNS have invaded your home of BUGGERWORLD! You must pilgrim across the many WORLDS to defeat these enemy CLOWN insurgents and bring peace back to your domain!

name: Buried Shards
summary: Get Inmersed in the intriguing narrative adventure of Buried Shards, progressing through the story chapters while alternating between day and night. Guide your sleepwalking self with house lights during the night and confront the traumas of your past in this unique blend of storytelling and puzzles.

name: Bubberknuckles
summary: Punch your way through the cosmos.

name: Buzz! Junior: Robo Jam
summary: Gameplay comprises multiple mini-games, each quite simple and straightforward to play using the four Buzz! controllers. It is primarily aimed at the family market but offers appealing entertainment to almost anyone of any age. The voice-over (Phil Hayes) introduces each game & the instructions. For example: if See-Saw pops up, Phil Hayes will say: "See-Saw!", and he'll say: "In this, your robot teams can use a see-saw. I'll pump it up & the see-saw will start to build up speed. Buzz when you want to let it go. Don't wait too long, though, or I'll lose my pump. Whoever stop the see-saw first wins.", & he begins the game, saying: "Be careful not to fall!", and he will say "FIRST ROUND!, ROUND 2!, ROUND 3!, ROUND 4!, & FINAL ROUND!" Simple game play allows young children to participate while still being entertaining enough for older children and adults. The game is similar in concept to Jungle Party, with robot based mini-games in a space-themed environment. One of the main differences between Jungle Party and Robo Jam is the introduction of AI, allowing players to play against the computer. Unlike Jungle Party there is no solo game mode. A full game can be played with only one human player and three computer players

name: Burn With Me
summary: Devil deckbuilder where you burn your cards to succeed.

name: Butt-Ugly Martians: Zoom or Doom
summary:
Butt-Ugly Martians: Zoom or Doom is a 2002 racing video game released by Runecraft. The game is based on the computer animated television series Butt-Ugly Martians.

The gameplay of Zoom or Doom focuses mainly on competitive racing, there are seven different racers in which two have to be unlocked by the player, each with different advantages such as handling and speed. There is also a time attack mode, as well as a practice mode and multiplayer mode which allows the player to race with a friend. The game has no autosave feature, meaning the player has to manually save the game or else all progress will be lost.

name: Bunny Zoo: Animal Battle Royale
summary: Choose your champion, master your skills, and conquer the animal kingdom‚Äîare you ready for the ultimate battle?

name: Bug Splash TD
summary: Ignite enemies with fire, shatter their defenses or simply knock them into the next wall in this strategic tower defense experience. Defend your gate against ... well who guessed it ... bugs! Use a variety of towers, each with it's own special effect to keep them at distance!

name: Burn-Out
summary:
You are entering college. You left the comfort of high school and became a grown-up, with all the responsibilities that come with it.
Your main focus is to validate your first year, but to do so, you'll need to make some sacrifices and work hard.

name: Burnin' Rubber Shift
summary: Finally you can experience the speed and power of the Burnin' Rubber series in the palm of your hands! Push your reflexes to the limit in this extremely challenging highway race. The game is filled with all of your favourite BR racing cars with cool neon paintjobs perfectly suited for nighttime racing madness.

name: Butano Fighter
summary: Open source GBA shoot 'em up

name: Build and Play
summary: These games promote different strategies. Moreover, each of the four games can be personalized to ANY scrabble-like crossword board game including but not limited to classic word game like Scrabble, and more modern word games like Words with Friends, Words with Friends Fast Play, Wordfeud, Word chums, and Word chums Quick Play, as well as their variations.

name: Bubsy: Paws on Fire - Limited Edition
summary: Bubsy is back in his greatest adventure yet!

name: Bulletorium
summary: Bulletorium is a dynamic and fast top-down shooter with a lot of shootouts, base capture and management, AI controlling and various upgrades and boss fights.

name: Bunny Sudoku
summary: Play classic Sudoku in a new way as a Bunny with other players in co-op mode. Try new unique endless multiplayer mode - Sudoku Defense.

name: Bubble Pong Pong
summary: Bootleg of Alpha's "Miss Bubble II", which was itself a bootleg of Taito's "Bubble Bobble".

name: Bullet Party
summary:
The party co-op shoot ‚Äôem up!
Become the king of the night club alone or group your friends and shoot the party crashers down !

name: Bus Driver Simulator 2019: Tourist
summary: The Tourist is a high-capacity Soviet intercity bus. It is a little longer than its urban counterpart and has no automatic doors. More comfortable, the Tourist features reclining seats with reading lights and individual ventilation for all passengers.

name: Bus Controller Simulator
summary: In Bus Controller Simulator you play as worn out ticket inspector working in an exploiting public transport company.

name: Bunny Blocker
summary:
The bunnies are hungry. And they won't stop just because a giant boulder is in their way. They won't even stop if a wolf is about to make them lunch! 
 
This is where you come in. Manipulate the environment so the bunny can make it successfully to the basket of carrots. Not as easy as it sounds. Slide fences, move boulders, open doors, and block those wolves!

name: Bubble Bubbling
summary: Match at least Four bubbles in one line to get scores.

name: Buccaneers! The New Age of Piracy
summary: Witness the rise of piracy in this prologue to Buccaneers!, a classic pirate RPG. Command and customise a powerful warship on PC or in VR and take part in tense naval and land battles that will put your swashbuckling skills to the test.

name: Bunni: How We First Met
summary: Find love and adventure on the magical Island of Bunni! Rebuild the island, plant trees and flowers, and collect a bustling village of adorable animals. Can you marry your true love?

name: Bubble Spinner
summary: Bubble Shooter with a fun twist: the bubbles are on a rotating platform. See if you can knock them all out. Very addicting!

name: Burned Out
summary: Pinch out the fuses before they reach the top.

name: Buried Memories
summary: Memorize the locations of the three items the dog buried, and then dig up the one shown.

name: Butt
summary:
This is a game about collecting butt.
You click butt, you get butt. Sometimes a little, sometimes a lot.

name: Buzz! The Hollywood Quiz
summary:
Buzz!: The Hollywood Quiz is the fifth installment in the Buzz! series of video games developed for the PlayStation 2 by Relentless Software. Players have to answer questions asked by the quiz master (the eponymous Buzz) using the four Buzz! remote controls.

There are two games available in the single player mode, which are Time Builder, where answering questions will gain time in the final round, and Hotseat, where players must answer as many questions as they can, using the time they accumulated in Round 1. To gain points, players must bank when appropriate. If they get a question wrong, they lose all the points they did not bank

name: Build 'm up, Shoot 'm down!
summary: Build 'm up, Shoot 'm down is a challenging game, even hard to complete. Play trough 4 rage inducing platformer levels progressing in difficulty to gather all parts for Army Guys canon. While you Build it Up you will be facing hordes of enemies in the boss level. Shoot 'm all down to finish the game.

name: Bug Quest
summary: Welcome to BUG WORLD! Befriend many strange and silly bugs as you journey through its many zones on your BUG QUEST.

name: Butterfly Effect
summary: Butterly Effect is a traditional Yume Nikki fangame. The goal is to collect all four effects scattered throughout the world. You play as Mari exploring areas which reflect memories.

name: Build A Train 2
summary:
Build A Train 2 is the sequel to the top train app Build A Train!

MILLIONS of little train-lovers have enjoyed the original Build A Train, and many have asked us to be able to create their own maps.

Well now you can!

Build A Train 2 lets kids design their own custom train engines and cars, build their own maps, and then drive their trains on their maps.

name: Burning Dragon
summary: A shooter developed for the PC-98 by WiZ in 1993.

name: BurgerTime Micro Player
summary: Armed with only a pepper shaker, Peter Pepper stepped into the arcade and into our hearts in 1982. Its highly addictive game play, unusual characters, and comedic storyline made BurgerTime an arcade classic. A game that‚Äôs still challenging, exceedingly fun, and a shining reminder of the family friendly vibe and excitement that defined the early days of video games.

name: Bubble Ball!
summary: Combine balls of the same type to create bigger balls and earn as many points as possible without filling up the container in this cheery, casual puzzle game! And if you dare use the Ball Launcher, beware of bouncing balls to the stratosphere...

name: Bubble Gun 3D
summary: The most unique, addicting and satisfying shooting game so far!

name: Bullet Heli
summary: Bullet Heli is a splitscreen bullet hell shooter, where you and a friend team up in your copters

name: Burn the Witch
summary: THEY TOLD ME TO MAKE THE BURN THE WITCH. ROGUELIKE IN THE DARK FANTASY SETTING. I'M NOT AGAINST IT

name: Bullezine
summary: In Bullezine, you guide Luna, the queen of Bullezine, to save her people from "oblivion." Inspired by classic roguelites, Bullezine aims to be a simplified and accessible version of the genre for a wider audience.

name: Bule Form
summary: „ÄäËìùËâ≤ÂΩ¢ÊÄÅ(Bule Form)„ÄãÊòØ‰∏ÄÊ¨æBLÂêëËßíËâ≤ÊâÆÊºî„ÄÇ‰ª•ÈÉΩÂ∏Ç‰∏∫‰∏ªË¶ÅÊ¥ªÂä®Âú∞ÁÇπÔºåÂú®ÈÉΩÂ∏Ç‰∏éÊàòÂå∫‰πãÈó¥ËæóËΩ¨„ÄÇÂú®ÊàòÊñó‰∏≠ÊâìË¥•‰Ω†ÁöÑÊïå‰∫∫ÔºåÁ†¥Ëß£Ë∞úÈ¢òÊé®Ëøõ‰∫ã‰ª∂ÂèëÂ±ï„ÄÇ

name: Bug Bite!
summary: Bug Bite is an exhilarating game that puts players in the paws of a courageous squirrel on a mission to conquer a bug-infested forest. As the nimble squirrel dashes through lush environments, players must skillfully jump, slide, and use power-ups to defeat swarms of pesky bugs while collecting nuts for extra points. With vibrant visuals, challenging levels, and an infectious soundtrack, Bug Bite offers a captivating adventure for players of all ages. Get ready to embark on an epic squirrelly quest and prove your bug-bashing prowess in this action-packed, critter-crushing extravaganza!

name: Business Shark
summary: You will have to develop your city, watch over expenses, strive for higher tax revenues, meet the needs of your residents by producing the right products for them

name: Burden of 80 Proof
summary:
Somewhere out in the suburbs, an cubicle full of nonsense sits unnoticed, unmolested. Rich has taken the day off.

At a different office, somewhere else, Peter Kent is embroiled in an over-caffeinated, lightning-paced, perfectly normal day at work.

It's good then, that Rich has arranged for "the house." A relaxing, semi-permanent party headquarters to be used all summer by the two of them, their boozy crew of half-wit friends, and anyone who follows the trail of noise to their doorstep. Unfortunately, a bit of confusion has left the boys with all house and no supplies.

So is it possible to have a good time, the kind of good time to which Rich and Peter are accustomed, without any preparation at all?

The answer, as it turns out, is no. We'll still need beer. Definitely. Right? And some other stuff.

And so with no money, no patience, and a lunch hour long since spent, can Peter secure the supplies necessary to fend off the fearsome hurricane of boredom which threatens this warm, warm weekend?

name: Bumaga
summary: This walker from 3 persons, the world of which is made of paper. the mechanics here are simple, you can run, jump and create platforms in the indicated places. According to the plot of the game, you need to collect 3 items with which to defeat the enemy in order to return your house and otherplaces.

name: Bumper Tanks
summary: Take control of a tank and dash into the fight in this couch multiplayer, fast-paced, twin-stick shooter game! Collect various power-ups to hook around the destructible environment and blast your friends with whatever it takes. Remember: One shot, One kill!

name: Bucket List
summary: Bucket List is a small humorous game about a spirit who is going through a "post-life" crisis.

name: BubbleXRush
summary: A block breaking game for Kindle Fire and Android devices, developed by Neon Drawing.

name: Bunker Life
summary: "Bunker Life" is a survival game to get through the Apocalypse. You need to explore various areas to obtain a new card. Acquire vehicles and expand your searchable range. Meet colleagues of various professions and join forces to survive.

name: Burn Depth
summary: Burn Depth is an underwater, exploration-focused horror game. Master a varied tool set, uncover the secrets of an underwater world, and survive an unwelcoming environment humanity was never meant to see.

name: ButtonMash
summary: You play as Joy, a lost controller trying to find their buttons back after you've been smashed to pieces. You will have to cross a cyberpunk style city, and a fantasy filled forest using the simple buttons you can find, and some of the more advanced ones. Good luck, and watch out for dragons.

name: Buried
summary: Get out of an underground research facility, but beware, don't get killed by the mysterious creatures. They hear you move. When they are close, hide and try not to breath. Avoid detection to get out of the facility.

name: Bug Explorers
summary: Bug Explorers is an educational minigame collection with an insect theme.

name: Bubble Cats Rescue
summary: Experience an adventure and join Alice the Cat as she races around the world to free all of her baby kitties! They need your help! Rescue them from the evil bubbles. You‚Äôll need to be skillful and accurate. With awesome next-generation physics, spectacular chain reactions, amazing power-ups and countless levels... Bubble Cats Rescue takes your gaming experience to the next level. Start your adventure today. Shoot the bubbles!

name: Business Wars
summary: Business Wars is an Adventure game, developed and published by Hect, which was released in Japan in 1992.

name: Bullet Looper
summary: Bullet-Looper is a simple puzzle game about bullets which loop across the screen. There are 20 small rooms to complete. Watch your back!

name: Bunny's Trail
summary: Do you have good memory? Observe the scene for a few seconds and memorize the position of the items. Avoid obstacles and collect all carrots.

name: Bubble Blaze
summary: Bubble Blaze is the thrilling bubble-popper game with millions of players worldwide.

name: Burning Skies Arcade
summary: You are the last hope for humanity against the evil General Bloodmester and his army of war machines. With fast-paced action and challenging levels, this free-to-play retro-style shoot 'em up game will take you back to the days of quarter-eating arcade machines.

name: Bullets in the Space
summary: Casual game with four different modes, unlockables, fun times and moderate difficulty.

name: Bubbaruka!
summary: A horror puzzle simulator about exploring an abandoned children's game, stalked by the the shambling husks of scrapped concepts that pursue you endlessly throughout the environment as you try to solve the cryptic puzzles left behind by the developers and keep your pet alive.

name: Bubble Night
summary: Let's run through the quiet night sky through the forest of buildings with the little girl.

name: Building Block Cities: Fire Copter Drills
summary: This game includes two major parts: building a city scene using the given building blocks and finishing fire copter drills on the scene. The building blocks can be assembled by matching color-coded faces on the blocks, and a drill is finished after the fire copter flies through all waypoint gates.

name: Burrow burrow
summary: Build a town in a magical but dangerous wilderness as you recruit different animal dudes and grow your community from a few weirdos around a campfire to a whole village!

name: Bunny Game
summary: A multiplayer social deduction game for up to 12 players. Bunnies stock up for winter, while traitors plan mischief. Better watch your back!

name: Buildodge
summary: A free to play 2D online shooter game! The game features " building". There are three different modes: Ranked Match, Bot Match, and Custom Match, for 1-4 players! Characters can be customized by changing their skin or painting.

name: Bullet Hell Collection: Volume 1
summary: Get ready to blast everything that stands in your way with this great compilation of 3 Shoot‚ÄôEm Up! Bullet Hell Collection: Volume 1 is a bundle of 3 great Shoot'em ups developed by Panda Indie Studio: Void Gore, Project Starship and Z-Warp.

name: BunnyShot
summary: Play as an Easter bunny, score points and save chickens using Easter eggs in BunnyShot!

name: !BurnToDie!
summary: !BurnToDie! - Hardcore platformer, in which you will take on the role of a brave cubic hero, who, despite hundreds of traps and obstacles rushed to save his beloved.

name: Buca!
summary: Buca is a rather simple game where you‚Äôll be trying to put a puck into a hole. The first levels will be easy, since there will only be a single obstacles ahead of you. With time, the difficulty of the game will start growing and each level will bring with itself ever more obstacles. You also need to hit the puck on your first try, since you cannot launch it more than once on a single level. There‚Äôs a total of 100 levels in the game, so you won‚Äôt get bored easily. You can play the game on your mobile phone, so good luck!

name: Bunny Bricks
summary: Bunny Bricks as ridiculed in the Mega Fun Party 3 demo

name: Buck Borris in Action
summary: You and Buck Borris and you have only one goal to survive a single night, but for that you will have to beat various monsters, using your teleport skills, hand radius, and your super punches. That and Buck Borris in action, so let's go to the crap?

name: Build It Green: Back to the Beach
summary: Help the inhabitants of a tropical island protect their homes and go green in this exciting building game from National Geographic. Build environmentally friendly housing, investigate alternative fuels, and upgrade your facilities with the latest green technology. Earn points and prestige as you protect a precious island paradise from pollution and exploitation.

name: Buggy Battle
summary: Fight in battle ,collect loot, buy weapons, armor, shields and modifications and become champion in BUGGY BATTLE.

name: BurgardTime
summary: A little homage to Data East's BurgerTime, developed by pixelplatforms.

name: Buoy Boy
summary:
The endless floater adventure of Buoy Boy is here!
Help him become a real boy again and collect all the treasure in the ocean.

name: Buzz! The Sports Quiz
summary: This is the third game in the Buzz! series and was developed by Kuju Entertainment. Players answer questions asked by the Quizmaster (Buzz) using their Buzz! buzzers. The format is very similar to an actual gameshow, fit with a Quizmaster, his 'delicious' sidekick (Rose), buzzers, a theme song and an audience which claps and laughs. In every type of game, players must choose from easy mode or hard mode.

name: Bultaneun Yeonghon
summary:
The sequel to Zinnia and one of the first Korean VGA freeware games. It rather openly brags with the feature by showing a bunch of digitized photographs in the intro. The plot actually tells a postapocalyptic scenario after the total pollution of the world, but the graphics don't do much to distinguish themselves from the average fantasy stuff. 
 
Of course there can't be expected too much from a freeware game, and there's not too much to it. One just walks around killing monsters to raise experience, before one is able to receive five special questions to solve the quest. Like Zinnia, Bultaneun Yeonghon is technically an action RPG, but its very heavy on the action and grinding.

name: Bug Aviators in Theme Park
summary: This is the game to attempt to recreate the realities having been in dreams of the creator. You can venture in the dreamy world of the handcrafted figures.

name: Bugs and Bullets
summary: As a lone military engineer on a strange planet you must survive the constant swarms of the hive! Shoot your way through millions of bugs! Collect upgrades and turn your turret into an unstoppable bug killing machine!

name: Bunosphere
summary: A Bunny in a strange world

name: Bubble Bobble Evolution
summary:
Bubble Bobble Evolution is a game in the Bubble Bobble series for the PSP system. It is known as Bubble Bobble Magical Tower Daisakusen in Japan.

Bub and Bob, the two main characters in the series, have been trapped in costumed versions of their bubble dragon forms (instead of physically into bubble dragons) [1] and are separated into each of the two Towers of Entertainment. Bub and Bob must traverse the towers while defeating the various enemies inside it.

The game's levels are now in a cylindrical structure, and there are puzzles that must be completed to progress through the game, such as activating switches and moving items.

name: Butterfly again
summary: In a world where not everyone has magic, the kingdom is suffering from an infestation known as "Insect Demon". But only those who can use magic can see the Insect Demon...

name: Build The Sun
summary: Explore, Settle and Expand in this god game of tiny proportions!

name: Buddytale
summary: Buddytale is exploration of our attachments to virtual pets, our responsibilities as their caretakers, and the way digital mortality effects the value we place on our relationships to computational entities. It is a series of vignettes, little snapshots into the relationship between an owner and their pet, from the day they meet until they must say goodbye.

name: Burden
summary: You‚Äôll see RPG the other way round: choose diseases instead of skills. Survive in the world of limited resources and constant danger.

name: BUMP! Superbrawl
summary: BUMP! Superbrawl is a 1V1 action strategy game set in a fantastical Utopia. Join an all-new competition with mythical heroes from around the world and become the ULTIMATE CHAMPION! Face off other players in action-packed strategic battles, test your skills in a variety of competitive game modes, switch up your tactics to master new challenges and climb your way up through the leaderboard!

name: Buffalo Bill's Wild West Show
summary:
Buffalo Bill presents a collection of six Wild West themed mini-games, which hang together around humour-lead presentation and backdrops.You can play as many or as few of these as you like, and can always have another go at them if you fail. 
 
First task is to throw knives at a spinning board upon which a surely-terrified and fortunately-skinny lady is locked - make sure to adjust for the rotation that will occur in the time your shot takes to hit. You get points for missing as many times as possible before hitting. Event 2 is based on shooting ability and is in two stages. First you must shoot the targets of criminals (but not innocents) as they emerge from the ground, next you must shoot the bottles they throw at you from over the horizon. 
 
Event 3 is Calf Roping, in which you must position yourself so as to be able to throw your rope around the poor cow's neck. This is followed by Bronco Riding, in which you must adjust your balance to compensate for the Bronco trying to throw you off, by pushing the joystick out to balance two bars. Level 5 starts off like the Cow Roping, as you jump onto a Steer, before a joystick-waggling section starts. Last of all is a side-scrolling game in which you jump onto a stagecoach which has been invaded by Indians, and beat up the hijacker.

name: Bumpers & Broadswords
summary: Pog Slammers X Fire Emblem?

name: Bullet Echo

name: Bust-A-Move Again
summary:
Puzzle Bobble 2 is a tile-matching video game by Taito. The first sequel to Puzzle Bobble, it was titled in Europe and North America as Bust-A-Move Again on the arcade and Bust-A-Move 2 Arcade Edition on the home consoles.

The game builds on the original by adding a tournament style variation on the two player game for play against the computer and by adding a branching map to the one player game, allowing the player to periodically select one of two groups of five levels to play next, leading to different game endings. Some of the contestants in the new tournament mode are based on characters from Bubble Bobble, including variations on a Monsta and a Mighta.

Completion of the single player game gives the player a code which can be entered to unlock 'Another World' for the single player game, which features subtle changes to the existing levels to increase their difficulty and changes to all backdrops to resemble levels from Bubble Bobble. The various enemies from Bubble Bobble also make an appearance in the background of the credits sequence.

The North American version of the original arcade release is much different than the other versions. One of the most major changes in this version is that Bub and Bob were removed from the game and replaced with a pair of disembodied hands. Also, the characters that were in the Vs. CPU mode were removed and replaced with a generic computer. The backgrounds from the original version were also removed and replaced with 15 new backgrounds, but this also means that the backgrounds get looped in the Puzzle mode, which is 30 stages long. The audio was also changed, and the voices in the game were removed, even though they were in English anyway. These changes were only made for the Taito F3 System version, since the Neo Geo and console releases are based on the original Japanese version.

name: Bus Simulator 21: Iveco Bus Pack

name: Bunny Ribbit
summary:
Bunny Ribbit is a tough-as-nails puzzle platformer about a toad and a rabbit on a quest to board Noah's ark.

Traverse wacky worlds as you escape the ravaging flood and its rising waters. Teamwork will provide creative solutions to the challenges presented by stages in this retro-style homage to games of past.

name: Bubble Bobble: Lost Cave
summary:
The ‚ÄúBubble Bobble: Lost Cave‚Äù Project aims to create a new experience for every lover of the classic Bubble Bobble arcade game, designed by Fukio ‚ÄúMTJ‚Äù Mitsuji and crew back in 1986.

The aim is to provide the original Bubble Bobble coin-op with a whole hundred of different levels. Gameplay-wise, the game is going to retain all the mechanics of the original, but Bubblun and Bobblun will have to face a 100 challenging new stages.

name: Bumper 7

Bumper 7 is a collection of seven games and programs which includes:

Repeat 20: Based on Simon but instead of colours you get numbers. The computer gives you a sequence of four numbers which you then copy. If correct then the computer will add a number on to the sequence for you to guess.

Ski Slalom: You must control a H and move it left or right to go in between gates that move up the screen.

Paper Stone & Knife: Based on the game Rock, Paper, Scissors, you must decide whether to use Paper, Stone or Knife to beat the computer's choice. Paper beats Stone, Stone beats Knife and Knife beats Paper.

Snowflake: You must catch snowflakes that fall down the screen.

Patterns: This a program that lets you watch patterns appear on the screen.

Banco: Based on the card game Punto Banco and the idea is to get the nearest to nine.

Sketch: A program that allows you to draw shapes and pictures with a cursor.
